QuestData.Title: Round 2: Clever Ashyo & Ken-Ken
QuestData.Description: You may know your next challengers. They were arguing fiercely when they arrived, so I have charged them with fighting side by side.$b$bThis will teach them the strength of friendship, and possibly entertain me in the process.$b$bGo to the north eastern arena and face this jinyu and hozen.$b$bDo not be gentle, they need to learn to work together.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: These two traveling companions continue to harass each other.
